author: matsmcp
body:
# Add functionality to be able to use jumphosts

Please add support to use jumphosts  with ssh pssessions.
With SSH you can use the -J flag to jump through jump/Bastion-hosts for increased security or simplified networking.

I would like to see the same functionality with pssessions.

comments.author: matsmcp
comments.body:
Could this be done by implementing to new options?  -JumpHost and -JumpHostUser.
This would allow for using a separate set of creds to connect to the jumphost and another set for the target system. 

If using SSH keys they could be read from the same file /directory as already being used for -KeyFilePath

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @matsmcp It is open source project so you can fork and make experiments. Ask if you need help.

comments.author: matsmcp
comments.body: Well, to be honest I do not code C or C derivate code at all so if it should be an improvement. I shouldn't try to code it. I'm very happy to help out with testing and so on

title: add jumphost support for SSH PSSessions
